channel.title: Comments on: Sex, Race, and Politics in Online Dating

item.title: By: David Rutter
item.dc:creator: David Rutter
item.description: This one falls into the "no surprises here" camp for me. (Well, maybe I'm a bit surprised that the stated same race preference for men was so low, but I think your interpretation of this phenomenon is pretty likely to be on the mark.)
item.content:encoded: This one falls into the “no surprises here” camp for me. (Well, maybe I’m a bit surprised that the stated same race preference for men was so low, but I think your interpretation of this phenomenon is pretty likely to be on the mark.)

item.description: […] Matters, a blog run by some ex-Yahoo! scientists. It impressed with an amazing blog about racial preference in dating this week but going further back there is also a great one on using data from those crappy opt-in […]
